import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../App.css' import logo from "../assets/logo.png" import Check from './check' import { menuItem } from './ConstantList' export default function Sidebar() { function check(list){ if(list !== undefined){ list.map((item)=>
  • {item.name}
    • ) } } const [inactive, setInactive] = useState(false) return (
    setInactive(!inactive)} className='toggle-button'>
      {menuItem.map((item)=>
    • {item.name}
      • )}
    ) }
